overview: Grape harvest in Rasiguères, a village in the French Pyrenees. An intense month of shared life. Amid changing times, workers reminisce about the days of collective work in the fields. Tradition and motions as old as the vines are taken up afresh by today's vintagers and made their own. A 16mm b/w fieldwork film, a document of the past.
title: La Dernière Année
